metadata.name: Suspicious XOR Encoded PowerShell Command
metadata.comment: Detects presence of a potentially xor encoded powershell command

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('powershell\.exe', 'pwsh\.dll')) AND lower(device.desc) = lower('windows powershell') AND lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('powershell core 6') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bxor')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('foreach')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('for(')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('for ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-join ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-join\'')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-join"')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-join`')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('::join')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('[char]'))))

output.summary: Detects presence of a potentially xor encoded powershell command
